Author: GitHub
Title: How one string broke the internet #Log4Shell
Description:
How can a single string of text cause a global cybersecurity crisis? In this clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier gives a clear, technical explanation of the Log4Shell vulnerability. Learn about JNDI and the simple-but-critical oversight that allowed this flaw to happen.

#Log4j #Cybersecurity
